item.title: ImportHTML
item.dc:creator: josephscott
item.description: Recently Zach Klein mentioned ImportHTML for Google Docs: https://twitter.com/zachklein/status/701539771277905922 So I tried it out on the Supreme Court Nominations page ( on senate.gov ): [sourcecode] =ImportHTML( "http://www.senate.gov/pagelayout/reference/nominations/Nominations.htm", "table", 3 ) [/sourcecode] I was impressed with the result.
item.content:encoded:
Recently Zach Klein mentioned ImportHTML for Google Docs:

https://twitter.com/zachklein/status/701539771277905922

So I tried it out on the Supreme Court Nominations page ( on senate.gov ):

[sourcecode]
=ImportHTML( "http://www.senate.gov/pagelayout/reference/nominations/Nominations.htm", "table", 3 )
[/sourcecode]

I was impressed with the result.
